articles.title: Celtics post one of NBA’s best offensive performances as they await Jayson Tatum’s possible return
articles.description:
Boston will now wait to see if Sunday night’s home matchup with the Philadelphia 76ers will mark the return of Tatum.

The post Celtics post one of NBA’s best offensive performances as they await Jayson Tatum’s possible return appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics showcased one of the NBA's top offensive performances recently.
Boston awaits Jayson Tatum's potential return for the February 28 game against Philadelphia.
Tatum's return could significantly boost the team's chances in the playoffs.
